VI.ii.2.6.b
.
Adjusting an Award Based on a Reduction in the Combined Disability Rating
If, while VA is withholding all of a Veteran’s compensation to recoup separation benefits, VA decides a decrease in the Veteran’s combined disability rating is in order, the provisions of
38 CFR 3.105(e)
still apply.
Even though the Veteran is
not
receiving compensation, VA
must
send a notice of proposed adverse action to the Veteran, and
allow the Veteran 60 days to provide evidence showing why VA shouldn’t take the proposed action.
Reference
:  For more information on notifying a Veteran of a proposed adverse action under
38 CFR 3.105(e)
, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 4.B
.
